definitions.definition: Particularly, an inspection by a medical professional to establish the extent and nature of any sickness or injury.
A formal test involving answering written or oral questions under a time constraint and usually without access to textbooks.
To observe or inspect carefully or critically
definitions.example: He examined the crime scene for clues.

definitions.definition: To check the health or condition of something or someone
To determine the aptitude, skills or qualifications of someone by subjecting them to an examination

definitions.example: The witness was examined under oath.
